project.description: An orchestration layer for AI coding assistants (currently Claude Code) that enforces consistency, reliability, and more predictable outputs through a marketplace of development standards, automation tools, and workflow management components.

default.responsibility: Root marketplace module that aggregates all bundles and provides the pyprojectx-based build system for testing, linting, and verification of Python scripts across the entire repository.

default.purpose_reasoning: Root module aggregating 9 child bundles, no direct source code

test.description: Pytest test suites organized by bundle for verifying Python scripts across all bundles
